DID YOU KNOW?
- our rate is standardized for residential duct cleaning: $299 + hst up to 15 vents, each additional vent is $5.
- for crawlspaces, multiple furnaces, condos, commercial buildings, industrial spaces, furnace blower/ac coil cleaning and dryer vent cleaning - please call 416-668-4607 or email info@davesducts.com
- we want you to be happy with our service, if there is anything that you are not happy with before, during or after our service; let us know - we'll be happy to correct it; we want you to know that we value your business and will always ensure we perform this service properly and thoroughly for you and your home.
- we encourage you to shadow us as we work; we have nothing to hide; we want you to know everything about the work we are doing in your home so if you've got questions...ask away!
- all our air duct cleaning technicians have passed numerous background checks for your security, comfort and peace of mind! We are all BackCheck verified!
- we believe that consumers have the right to know everything about the services they're receiving in their home; QUADCA was created to help and protect consumers from "blow and go" air duct cleaning companies - we are the official QUADCA Ambassador for the Greater Toronto Area. Visit www.quadca.com for more information!
- for a company to be considered NADCA certified, they are only required to have 1 ASCS (Air Systems Cleaning Specialist); We have EIGHT (8) ASCS Technicians and NINE (9) VMTs (Ventilation Maintenance Technicians) to serve you and your home!
- we also have (6) SIX CVI (Certified Ventilation Inspectors) on staff that can inspect your residential, commercial or industrial HVAC systems.
- NADCA publishes the names of individuals that hold the ASCS designation, make sure your home is being cleaned by a certified and qualified individual; to find out if your technician is certified, please visit: www.nadca.com
- ASCS is the HIGHEST level of certification you can possess; VMT is the bare MINIMUM level of certification your cleaning technician should possess
- We will only send ASCS cleaning technicians to perform our service in your home!
- we DO NOT sub-contract our work and DO NOT telemarket
- we maintain 3 vehicles, 1 inspection vehicle and have 10 employees on payroll with full health benefits
- we are members of WSIB and have $5M in comprehensive business liability insurance
- we provide PROOF OF WORK by taking before/after pictures; this is the only way we know an HVAC system is thoroughly cleaned!
- your service should take between 2-3 hours with a 2 person crew (based on a 2000-3000 sq ft home)
- we are only able to accommodate 3 jobs maximum per day per vehicle
- if a job takes longer than anticipated to complete, we will always stay as long as it takes to complete the job properly and will always advise our customers accordingly
- your service can be performed with either truck mounted, van mounted or portable HEPA filtered vacuums; all these machines conform to NADCA standards and will yield the same results: CHECK OUT THIS VIDEO: http://bit.ly/1h78y0X
- the length of time it takes to clean an HVAC system is NOT dependent on type of equipment used; provided equipment conforms to NADCA standards
- time it takes to clean an HVAC system is dependent on: 1) ACCESS 2) SIZE OF HVAC SYSTEM 3) TYPE OF HVAC SYSTEM 4) OTHER SERVICES PERFORMED - each HVAC system is different and should be treated as such!
- NADCA certified professionals have the ability to properly assess, maintain and restore all types of HVAC systems
- your vents should always be sealed during the cleaning process
- when done properly, your HVAC system need not be cleaned for at least 5-7 years (under normal living conditions).
- for more information, we've compiled various resources (videos and cleaning standards) to educate you and your family better, copy and paste the following link: http://www.davesducts.com/faq/consumer-education

To view our service area map, copy and paste the following link: http://bit.ly/U3Pt5c

For references (as early as today) or questions about your HVAC system or just to say 'hello' - please call! (416) 668-4607 or visit: www.davesducts.com - WE LOOK FORWARD TO SERVING YOU AND YOUR HOME!

Air Purification

The air in your home, for the most part, is the same air being re-circulated over and over again - contaminants included. There are a variety of options for air purifiers, at all budget levels, that can help you take the next step in a healthier home. LG Home Comfort technicians can guide you through the simplest room solutions right up to whole home air purifiers with hepa filters and UV-C lights. Water Purification

Your homes’ water is an essential part of your everyday life - everything you do in your home requires it! But did you know the quality of your water can also affect the efficiency and lifespan of your appliances? Hard water can cause internal build up of minerals in your washing machine, dishwasher and hot water heater. The level of water purification your home needs depends on the combination of your current water and what outcomes you are looking for.

We offer a full range of water treatment options: softeners, chlorine & iron filters and reverse osmosis units. Allow the LG team to test your water, free of charge, and design a water purification system that gives you the best water possible.
